sentences.en: Both countries have much to lose if there is a war.
sentences.cn: 若战事一起，两国均会损失惨重。

sentences.en: By the time the ambulance arrived, Douglas had lost consciousness .
sentences.cn: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

sentences.en: England doesn't want a war but it doesn't want to lose face.
sentences.cn: 英格兰不想打仗，但也不想丢面子。

sentences.en: Having children was the quickest way to lose your street cred.
sentences.cn: 生孩子是使自己不再年轻时尚的最快方法。

sentences.en: He appealed to his countrymen not to lose heart.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁自己的同胞不要丧失信心。

sentences.en: he was trying to work out how he could go back home without losing face.
sentences.cn: 他在设法找出不失面子回家的办法。

sentences.en: I can lose a few pounds without resorting to daft diets.
sentences.cn: 我不用疯狂地节食也能减轻几磅。

sentences.en: I followed her on foot, but lost her in the crowd.
sentences.cn: 我走在她后面，可是在人群中跟丢了。

sentences.en: I've been told to lose weight and stop smoking.
sentences.cn: 我被告知要减肥并戒烟。

sentences.en: I’ve lost my appetite.
sentences.cn: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.en: I've never seen him get cross or lose his temper.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过他生气或者发火。

sentences.en: If you don't do it soon you're going to lose the opportunity.
sentences.cn: 不赶紧行动就没机会了。

sentences.en: It's so easy to lose track of who's playing who and when.
sentences.cn: 很容易就忘记谁要和谁比赛，什么时候比。

sentences.en: Klinger lost his seat in the election.
sentences.cn: 克林格在选举中失去了他的席位。

sentences.en: no one is losing any sleep over what he thinks of us.
sentences.cn: 没人在意他怎样看我们。

sentences.en: One woman in Brooklyn lost a husband and two sons in the gang wars.
sentences.cn: 在黑帮争斗中，布鲁克林的一名妇女失去了丈夫和两个儿子。

sentences.en: Peter was lost at sea when his ship sank.
sentences.cn: 轮船沉没，彼得葬身大海。

sentences.en: Sadly, Anna lost the baby (= her baby died before it was born ) .
sentences.cn: 安娜不幸流产。

sentences.en: Some battles you win, some battles you lose.
sentences.cn: 胜败乃兵家常事。

sentences.en: Some people can diet like crazy and not lose weight.
sentences.cn: 有些人拼命节食也不能减肥。

sentences.en: The deal was a long shot, but Bagley had little to lose.
sentences.cn: 这桩交易有些冒险，不过巴格利也没什么可损失的。

sentences.en: The shirt's cuffs won't sag and lose their shape after washing.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫的袖口洗后照样挺括，不变形。

sentences.en: They played so badly they deserved to lose.
sentences.cn: 他们打得这么差，输了活该。

sentences.en: Torn muscles retract, and lose strength, structure, and tightness.
sentences.cn: 撕裂的肌肉会收缩，丧失原来的力量、结构和紧实度。

sentences.en: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.cn: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.en: we're offering them for only £2.50—you can't lose!.
sentences.cn: 我们以 2.5英镑的价格提供商品，包你得益！。

sentences.en: You'll lose your girlish figure if you don't watch out.
sentences.cn: 如果不多加注意，你就会失去女孩般的苗条身段。

phrases.tran_cn: 因…而吃亏；因…而遭受损失
退却，后退；股市下跌；处于不利的地位
失去兴趣；对…失去兴趣；对…缺乏兴趣
输掉，失败：未能达到或收到预定的目的

trans.tran_cn: 输掉，遗失，损失，被夺去，减轻，不明白，逃脱，浪费（时间），走慢，删掉，亏损
trans.tran_en: if you lose a relative or friend, they die – use this when you want to avoid saying the word ‘die’
to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it
